changeSet.sql:
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.relpace_inventory_item_with_equip_item') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.relpace_inventory_item_with_equip_item GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.relpace_inventory_item_with_equip_item @account_id dbo.id_t, @character_id dbo.id_t, @inven_item_id dbo.id_t, @equip_item_id dbo.id_t, @slot_id TINYINT, @equip_part TINYINT, @unequip_part TINYINT AS SET NOCOUNT ON
BEGIN TRY BEGIN TRANSACTION
UPDATE dbo.Inventories SET slot_id = @slot_id WHERE id = @inven_item_id
DELETE FROM dbo.Equipments WHERE account_id = @account_id AND character_id = @character_id AND equip_part = @unequip_part
UPDATE dbo.Inventories SET slot_id = 0 WHERE id = @equip_item_id
INSERT INTO dbo.Equipments (account_id, character_id, equip_part, inventory_id) VALUES (@account_id, @character_id, @equip_part, @equip_item_id)
COMMIT END TRY BEGIN CATCH ROLLBACK END CATCH
SET NOCOUNT OFF
changeSet.rollback: IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.relpace_inventory_item_with_equip_item') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.relpace_inventory_item_with_equip_item GO
